bug.author: robert4os
bug.summary: Missing documentation to deprecated forecasting parameters
bug.description:
Hi, I am receiving the deprecate warnings, but the documentation is not reflecting these changes. e.g. WARNING - Forecasting parameter country_or_region will be deprecated in the future, please use holiday_country instead. WARNING - Forecasting parameter max_horizon will be deprecated in the future, please use forecast_horizon instead. WARNING - Forecasting parameter grain_column_names will be deprecated in the future, please use time_series_id_column_names Thank you and best regards, Robert [Enter feedback here] <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h4>Document Details</denchmark-h>
⚠ Do not edit this section. It is required for docs.microsoft.com ➟ GitHub issue linking.
ID: 0bc2b21e-6b1a-cb94-2857-147177a29d7c Version Independent ID: d14620a6-a2f6-49f1-632e-73903d41de8c Content: azureml.train.automl.automlconfig.AutoMLConfig class - Azure Machine Learning Python Content Source: AzureML-Docset/stable/docs-ref-autogen/azureml-train-automl-client/azureml.train.automl.automlconfig.AutoMLConfig.yml Service: machine-learning Sub-service: core GitHub Login: @DebFro Microsoft Alias: debfro

comments.comment: Hello, Thanks for your comment! I have updated all the AutoML documentation to refer to the new forecasting parameter names. The updates should be live within 1 or 2 days at most. Please feel free to close now, or when you see the changes reflected. Thanks, Sabina

Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/robert4os>@robert4os</denchmark-link> just a ping that the documentation is live now: <denchmark-link:https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/how-to-auto-train-forecast>https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/how-to-auto-train-forecast</denchmark-link>
#please-close this issue since the doc is already available.
